Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed near Garfield
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Garfield due to a report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing near Garfield due to a report of a minor fire at track level.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
